mapper.select: select count(*) from board where status = 'Y'
select board_no , board_title , board_writer , count , to_char(create_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "create_date" , origin_name from board where status = 'Y' order by board_no desc

mapper.update: update BOARD set COUNT = COUNT+1 where STATUS = 'Y' and BOARD_NO = #{bno}
mapper.select: select BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, to_char(CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')"create_date", BOARD_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME from BOARD where BOARD_NO = #{bno}
